item.title: DTC | Ecommerce Ad Creatives - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a video editor to make amazing ad creatives. We are a marketing agency and part of our client base are DTC/B2C e-commerce brands.
We handle the content and the creative we need for our clients ads.
As the creative editor, you will play an important role in the service.

QUALIFICATIONS
You're a T shape: you need to have some sort of knowledge in performance marketing, and copywriting and specialize in the creative creation process. (THIS IS A PLUS!!)
Creative creation: you need to be able to make high-converting product images and videos, and high-catching thumbnails.
Communicate: you need to be able to communicate every step of the way, and be open to working with a team.
You need to have experience & proof of concept in creating high converting product creatives.
WHAT YOU'LL GET
You will be creating a limited amount of creatives weekly for 1 of our clients in the first month.
Subject to evaluating your workmanship during thus time, you will recieve a gradually increased load.
This role will evolve into a full time role within our team.

Paid Trial Project:
Enquire within for an initial trial - so I fan evaluate the quality of your work. This is an urgent job with a 1 day turn around. We need 3 × 30 second creatives, delivered within 1 day. Images/footage will be provided. Details will be provided to short-listed applicants.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 16:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Performance Video, Video Editing, Banner Ad Design, Advertising, UGC, Product Video, Product Photography, Creative Strategy
Skills: Testimonial Video, Performance Video, Video Editing, Banner Ad Design, Advertising, UGC, Product Video, Product Photography, Creative Strategy
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: French & English Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I have an editor with whom I create English videos, and I would like to find someone to help me make the French versions. I’d record it again in French this time, and your goal would be to adapt the Adobe Premiere (2023 or 2024) project to the French recording (so edit effect timings mostly), replace the English recording, and translate the text on the screen to French.

I did it myself and it’s actually much easier than re editing everything I feel like. Of course synchronizing the new French recording takes time, but that’s all you gotta do and translate the sentences shown. It takes me like around 3 hours to do it and I’m not a professional editor like you.

So the goal is to:
0. open the 2023 file (download fonts before) to make sure it opens properly
1. Take the french recording and match with audio
2. make cuts to fit the script and remove retakes
3. replace english video with french and adjust effect timings
4. replace english text for french text on screen and ideally english content with french content

Example video before and after translation:
English (original): (link removed)
French: (link removed)

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 16, 2024 15:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:French, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English to French Translation, English
Skills: French, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, English to French Translation, English
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Short Content Video Editor for Email Marketing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to assist our email marketing agency with simple short content video editing. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing videos for marketing purposes and be familiar with creating engaging content. You will be provided with complete scripts and existing videos that can be used as a foundation for editing, you just have to put everything together. This project is 24-30 short content videos and should take 1-3 weeks. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial for this role.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and assemble video footage
- Add text, sound, graphics, and animations as needed
- Ensure videos are optimized for various platforms and devices

Requirements:
- Proficiency in any video editing software
- Strong understanding of video marketing best practices
- Excellent time management and organizational skills
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Let me know if you are interested or if you have any questions.

Simon

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 16, 2024 15:48 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Copywriting, Content Writing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Copywriting, Content Writing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Post-Editing
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for 3D Rendered Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to enhance the narrative of a 3D rendered video for our beta launch. Your task will be to take the existing video and improve its storytelling using video editing software. This includes enhancing the visuals, adjusting the pacing, adding transitions, and incorporating any necessary effects to create a compelling and engaging video. The final video should effectively showcase the features and benefits of our product.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills
- Ability to work with 3D rendered videos

This is a small-sized project with an estimated duration of less than 1 month. We are looking for an expert level video editor with a keen eye for detail and a creative mindset to bring our video to life.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 16, 2024 15:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Maxon Cinema 4D, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Maxon Cinema 4D, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Video editing to create a 90 seconds teaser For a ski mountaineering device - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talent who can make a nice max 90 seconds product treaser starting from the raw footage in this folder https://www.icloud.com/sharedalbum/#B0xGgZLKuGCKnOX
The video should begin with some intro showing the mountains to become evocative, if needed you can add some extra footage from libraries, then you show the part of climbing with the ski, you quickly show the part where the ski gets ready for descent and then showing a bit of the descent part.  You shall select a nice music so that we can pay the license for the same.  Part of the video will be used in our website https://e-skimo.swiss/ for the climb and descent part. feel free to use graphics and icons if needed.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 16, 2024 15:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can edit my reels/shorts in this exact same style. You need to be able to prove with a sample or with your portfolio that you are able to edit in this way.

The videos are in german, but you will be given the full script and translation to edit accordingly.

I am looking for someone who is looking to work with me long term on this project. Depending on the quality of your edits, I will pay you 300-500$ per month for 10-20 videos.

item.title: Build Example Kdenlive Project for Green Screen - Upwork
item.description:
I have some video footage of a person talking in front of a green screen and I'm looking to replace the background with an orange color. I put something together on my own to crop it out, but the edges look rough and have a lot of green bleed.

I'm looking for someone to take the clip that I have and do a better job of cropping out the green screen. I have a lot of these clips to do, so I would need the .kdenlive file at the end to use as a reference for the rest of the videos.

You can find the project I have so far here:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1g8TWPj_n2TNjgzumBSSvXHDlGmAsPwhT?usp=sharing

Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 16, 2024 15:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Kdenlive
Skills: Kdenlive
Country: United States
click to apply
